modName: Jannifer's RaceMenu Presets All in One
summary: This is a simple combination of my two individual RaceMenu preset packs.  The only requirements for these presets are SKSE and RaceMenu by Expired.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=#ffd966]Jannifer's Racemenu Presets All in One v1.0[/color][/b][/size]


[color=#ff0000][u]
Requirements:[/u][/color]  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by Expired6978[/url]
                       [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]Skyrim Script Extender[/url] (SKSE)
                       no other mods required
[color=#e06666]

[u]Please note:[/u][/color]  This mod does NOT have an .esp file, so it will not show up in your load order.  This is as it should be.

I like making characters; I've made lots of characters.  This pack is a combination of my two preset packs for RaceMenu so that you may have men and women all in one convenient download.  RaceMenu's features have allowed me to create custom skin, hair and makeup colors; smooth the face and chin; make tiny adjustments to facial features and just generally create whomever I see in my head.  Take them, tweak them, make them truly yours.  They are only presets (the basic face shape and features), so they will work with any skin, hair or eye mod you care to use.  If you've created your own bit of awesomeness, post a screenshot.  I'd love to see what you do with my beginnings.

[i]
[b]To install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM):[/b][/i]

[list=1]
[*]Use the Download (NMM) button.
[*]Highlight the mod in NMM.
[*]Click the activate icon, the second from the top on the left hand side of the window.
[*]Wait for NMM to finish.
[/list]
[i][b]
To install manually:[/b][/i]

[list=1]
[*]Use the Download (manual) button.
[*]Unzip the mod with your favorite archiving program.
[*]Drag and drop the files into the Steam\Steam apps\Common\Skyrim\Data folder.
[*]Click "Yes" to allow the over-write.
[/list]
[b]
[i]To use the Presets:[/i][/b]

You must have RaceMenu, or these presets will not work.

[list=1]
[*]With RaceMenu open, choose the race for the preset you plan to use.

[*]Click on the Presets tab.
[*]Hit F9 to load a preset.
[*]Choose the preset you wish to load.  All my presets use my characters' names.
[*]Edit as you please to make my preset truly your character.
[/list]


The mods that I have used are:

 1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin by Maevan2[/url]
 2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins by fadingsignal[/url]  (For my men, I am using Version 1.5 and the young option.)
 3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty, including the Elves version, by LogRaam
[/url] 4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHairs[/url]
 5. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos -- Renewal by Kalilies, Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/url]
 6. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows by Hvergelmir
[/url] 7. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]
[/url] 8. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56623/?]SC Khajiit Improvement by ShinglesCat[/url]
 9. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?]Cover Khajiit by mrLenski[/url] (texture)
10. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42043/?]FAR -- Forgotten Argonian Roots by redtox[/url] (textures)
11. Argonian Feather Hair by KrittaKitty  (This mod is now part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58857/?]Hott Argonians by KrittaKitty and Nerd of Prey[/url].)


The presets for each race are as follows:

Altmer -- Eliandri and Telinwe; Telenn and Methryn
Argonian -- Glows-in-Moonlight and Walks-in-Beauty; Stands Tall and Moves in Shadow
Bosmer -- Tessah and Kelwyn; Taliesen and Venahn
Breton -- Morgaine and Ygraine; Dafydd and Iain
Dunmer -- Anashabi, Tessri and Vul-Kes; Drusahz and Inashind
Imperial -- Tess, Juliana and Vespasia; Matthias and Julian
Khajiit -- R'hu and Delilah; J'zhimp and S'hazam
Nord -- Brita and Brynja; Jan and Wilhem
Orc -- Tez gra-Rekt and Shotti gra-Nee; Rhetz gro Sed and Kahz gro Tesk
Redguard -- Imshallah and Tyessa; Alahemm and Kaleb


Future plans:

I am pretty much done with creating new presets for this mod.  However, it's very likely I'll be going back in and making minor tweaks here and there.  I do that.


Permissions:

If you use one of my presets for a follower mod, please drop me a note and credit me for the face.  It's only polite.

This mod is, and will remain, a Nexus exclusive.  Do not upload it anywhere else, period.


Thanks:
[color=#ea9999]
I appreciate every download and every endorsement; Nexus members are awesome.

My  thanks to the modders whose work has enriched my own. 

My special thanks goes to the regulars of the Nexus chatroom, especially JustATaco, who kept saying, "You need to make another mod!".

And a callout to JustATaco and KunoMachi for testing my mods.
[/color]

My Other Mods:
